title: Rec: Yurusarezarumono
synopsis: While going out to eat with his roommate Aka Onda, Fumihiko Matsumaru encounters Tanaka, a woman from his company's accounting department who had previously stood him up on a date. Dumped by her boyfriend just minutes before, Tanaka forces Fumihiko to drink with her, spurring Aka's jealousy.
staff: [['Ooshima, Miku', ['Assistant Producer']], ['Nakamura, Ryuutarou', ['Director', ' Episode Director', ' Storyboard']], ['Aketagawa, Jin', ['Sound Director']], ['Sakai, Kanako', ['Theme Song Performance']]]
